mapper.select: SELECT * FROM joinus_chatmessage msg LEFT OUTER JOIN joinus_chatattach attach ON msg.message_num = attach.chatattach_msgnum WHERE message_num = (SELECT MAX(MESSAGE_NUM)FROM JOINUS_CHATMESSAGE) AND LENGTH(ATTACH.CHATATTACH_UUID) > 0 AND MSG.MESSAGE_SENDER = #{message_sender}

SELECT chatlist.* FROM joinus_chatmessage chatlist INNER JOIN (SELECT MAX(msg.message_num) maxnumber FROM joinus_chatmessage msg INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM joinus_chatroom WHERE chatroom_user = #{member_id} OR chatroom_user2 = #{member_id})room ON msg.chatroom_num = room.chatroom_num GROUP BY room.chatroom_num) lastmsg ON chatlist.message_num = lastmsg.maxnumber ORDER BY chatlist.message_sendtime desc
